title: Bronze builds
body:
I'm sick of people complaining about champions being Op. Like the riven QQ thread. I'll tell you right now why champs are OP.
Because you can't fucking stop building your damage item to by some resistances because for whatever reason your damage is always more important. 
"But I won't stand a chance if I build Amor and they build ad"
It increases the amount of damage you can take! That DOES NOT mean you can duel them now. That means you play around that. It means call for ganks! It means sustain in lane and soak up xP.it means you have lane presence. Riven QQ thread inspired me to write this. People complain that riven is op. As a riven main I can say she is pretty strong, but 99% of the time my opponents keep building their Tiamat or Brutalizer when I already have 2 kills on them. The only thing that does is tickle me more when I go shit on you again for the third time. Then you're gonna go on board and cry to riot that riven is op. no kid. How about you start building resistances when you are behind and I guarantee you your games won't go as bad if you play around that. This isn't call of duty, kills aren't the point of the game. Be the tank your team needs (especially when behind) and play as a team and no champ will seem op to you.
Edit:
This isn't a thread to focus on riven -.- it's an example. Point of story, build resistances or keep dying

Maybe it's cause pantheon is worthless without the damage, and udyr can become a stun machine for his team.

Lack of wards, and some bad builds aside I think the worst part of bronze is people don't know how to play the passive game when they get behind.  I had an Azir on my team yesterday he gave I swear 10 kills in lane, along with that our bot lane was feeding horribly but not as bad.  This Azir ended 3/28/14, and our bot lane came back and our adc ended positive and support ended same assists as deaths.  About 5 minutes in bot lane started arguing after giving kills I MUTED THEM AS EVERYBODY WHO READS THIS SHOULD! and continued focusing on my game. We could have won after holding off until 45 minutes, but they had 3 tanks and we didn't have enough peel or damage to get through them, the last fight under our nexus turrets we took out the carries but the tanks finished us off.  Point being if people hadn't of fed so hard, went passive, farmed under turret, their we wouldn't have had to hold off for 40 minutes to the point where their tanks became unkillable.

Well then, why ppl hate riven:

1.  Opressive early game. There are a few champs who have stronger lvl 2/3, but they usually lack 1v1 ult (ie panth, karma). or brutally fall of late game (ie garen)
2. Silly lvl 6. You managed to survive? Np riven gets +20% AD, and  an execute
3. The snowball potential. If riven gets even a bit ahead in lane, she sh*ts on people. 
4. Mobility. Lane bully is one thing, but riven with a bit of cdr means that you cannot hope to catch up to her
5. Late game. Unlike other irritating champs, riven is GOOD late game, even with just a decent farm. 
6. AD shield. What you said. Ahead: Build AD. Behind: Build AD (couse E). 
 
Rito moans that diana is unhealthy couse she can instagib you, and she has a targeted dash (= go in, do or die) Riven on the other hand, can EQ(3rd) in, AA + W + tiamat  +   AA + R, and kill you AND your two teammates. And she can bunny hop the hell away. But that's fair. 

Make no mistake, i tend to destroy every riven i come across with irelia, but the fact remains that she is hard to balance properly.

About builds. I'll argue with you there. When you get killed, and already have an amp tome + blue for sheen,  you should not just stop and say, let's build triforce whenever, I want a randuin first. Or heaven forbid a thornmail (especially against riven). 

You want to alter your build to the most defensive possible (ruby crystal asap in triforce case), but not abadon it halfway throught.

The problem with Riven is that her cooldowns are always up and even at early levels you have a very small window of opportunity to trade with her without losing the trade. A good riven will not use abilities to farm and will usually win trades unless countered. Once she has 40% CDR her cooldowns are just stupid for a fighter class with assassin like damage.

I personally don't mind riven because I play irelia and its an easy matchup but I can understand the problem people have with her.
